summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1303, for the improvement of 9th Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Harrison Street to Mercer Street, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14243 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
